file_content.text: Come on, I've been good. No fights, no rioting... so how about a little time off for good behavior?
You know the rules. No one gets off this rock.
Then how about a visitor? I got a couple lady friends from back home, nice gals....
Listen, pal, if I can't have visitors, you can't have visitors. Got it?
No visitors? And here I thought I was talking to a free man. What're you in for?
